library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)

KS = c(0.207, 0.408, 0.589, 0.753)
AD = c(0.198, 0.314, 0.456, 0.593)
plot(KS, type = "o", col = "black", ylim = c(0,1), x = c(10, 20, 30,40), xlab = "n1", ylab = "power")
lines(AD, type = "o", col = "red", x = c(10, 20, 30,40))
#title(main = "Cauchy Distribution (center) where n1 = n2")
legend("topleft", c("KS","AD"), fill=c("black","red"))
